Package: io.vertx.groovy.ext.dropwizard

[Groovy] Class MetricsService

    • io.vertx.groovy.ext.dropwizard.MetricsService

    • The metrics service mainly allows to return a snapshot of measured objects.

      • Properties Summary

        • Object getDelegate()

        • Map<String, Object> getMetricsSnapshot(Measured o)

          Will return the metrics that correspond with this measured object, null if no metrics is available.

          Note: in the case of scaled servers, the JsonObject returns an aggregation of the metrics as the dropwizard backend reports to a single server.

          Returns:
          the map of metrics where the key is the name of the metric (excluding the base name) and the value is the json data representing that metric
          Parameters:
          o
